patthana15.70:1.1: Araṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.70:2.1: Saraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.70:3.1: Araṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.70:5.1: Araṇo abyākato dhammo naaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Araṇo abyākato dhammo nasaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
patthana15.70:6.1: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare nissaye upanissaye purejāte vippayutte dve …pe… avigate dve.
